remarks: Reformulate the ` G ` function as a mapping with one variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)
statement:
ucnprima.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) $.
ucnprima.2 $e |- ( ph -> V e. ( UnifOn ` Y ) ) $.
ucnprima.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( U uCn V ) ) $.
ucnprima.4 $e |- ( ph -> W e. V ) $.
ucnprima.5 $e |- G = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> <. ( F ` x ) , ( F ` y ) >. ) $.
ucnimalem $p |- G = ( p e. ( X X. X ) |-> <. ( F ` ( 1st ` p ) ) , ( F ` ( 2nd ` p ) ) >. ) $.
$d F p x y $.
$d X p x y $.
